product_name: Delta Cycle Lockable Bike Hitch - Special Buy
long_description: Install the Delta Cycle Lockable Bike Hitch in your truck bed to make transporting your road or mountain bike simple. Mount the Bike Hitch in your truck bed using the Delta Cycle StableLoader(TM) Bike Mount (not included) or with a design of your own using lumber. Hitch features a special antirust treatment with a tough powder coat finish for long-lasting durability. Attach a lock (not included) to the Bike Hitch lever to secure your bike to the rack. Rigid 9mm skewer is strong and secure. Special buy.
short_description: Install the Delta Cycle Lockable Bike Hitch in your truck bed to make transporting your road or mountain bike simple.
